question.q: A good place to start with new smartphone customers is:

option.value: Basic features like touch screen, web browsing, and connectivity

question.q: Customers might love a smartphone's GPS features to:

option.value: Pinpoint their location on a map
A selling gimmick that likely won't get used
Only worthwhile if taking pictures of cats

question.q: To help customers understand apps, ask them:

option.value: If they prefer a larger or smaller touchscreen
What interests or hobbies they enjoy
What time they get up in the morning

question.q: A new smartphone customer may be:

option.value: Moving up from a feature phone
